TopicTitle: Crew Shuttle [Insert Cliche Space Shuttle Name Here]

Articles.Content:
Greetings! Today I'm presenting a craft I've recently designed that goes by the very generic name of "Crew Shuttle [insert cliche space shuttle name here]"

It can be seen here:

> //imgur.com/a/WMzvQ
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/WMzvQ)
> //imgur.com/a/WMzvQ

DOWLOAD LINK:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/p860chh6cip7vae/Crew%20Shuttle%20''Inspiration''.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/p860chh6cip7vae/Crew%20Shuttle%20Inspiration.craft?dl=0)

[WARNING: This craft does not include a launch vehicle; that's for you to build]

The required mods for this craft file are the following:

Mechjeb

Tweakscale

(In all likelihood optional) Ven's Stock Revamp

Adjustable Landing Gear

IF THERE ARE MORE MODS I'M FORGETTING ABOUT, PLEASE LET ME KNOW!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-10T18:16:45Z" title="08/10/2015 06:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 10, 2015</time> by Guerra**
I like seeing simple designs offered for the public to play with in their own creative backyards! Good job on this one!
